title: 1928 International Cross Country Championships
text:
The 1928 <a href="International%20Cross%20Country%20Championships">International Cross Country Championships</a> was held in <a href="Ayr">Ayr</a>, <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a>, on 24 March 1928.
Complete results, medallists, 
 and the results of British athletes were published.
Participation.
An unofficial count yields the participation of 45 athletes from 5 countries.
